name: Hire a Shipper
description: Hire a fulfillment specialist to manage order processing and shipping.

name: Inventory Tracking
description: Implement an inventory management system to track stock levels and prevent stockouts.
game_effect: Always see inventory counts and prevent workers from taking orders you don't have stock to fulfill.

name: Hire a Fabricator
description: Hire a fabricator to create custom products.

name: Discounted Shipping Rates
description: Negotiate discounted shipping rates with carriers to reduce shipping costs and increase profit margins.

name: SmartFill
description: Automatically fill in shipping fields based on previous orders.
game_effect: Eliminates a shipping step - inputting weights & dimensions!

name: Product Bundles
description: Bundle multiple products together to create a new product.
game_effect: Ship an additional product with each order.

name: Rate Shopper
description: Automatically compare shipping rates from multiple carriers to find the best rate for each shipment.
game_effect: Eliminates a shipping step - shopping for rates!

name: Order Grid Filters
description: Add filters to the order grid to quickly find and prioritize orders based on specific criteria.
game_effect: Ships orders who are expiring soon first, instead of picking by random.

name: Scan to Verify
description: Use a barcode scanner to verify that the correct items are being shipped.
game_effect: You won't lose products and cause customer issues (minigame)!

name: Purchase Orders
description: Create and manage purchase orders to keep track of inventory and costs.
game_effect: Prevents you from losing incoming parts for your widgets and having to run out and get some yourself (minigame).
